DataSource.query:
select
distinct
'A_'||vvs,
kd_nr,
substr(pers_kbez,1,55)||' KD '||kd_nr||' VVS '||vvs,
'N',
'Kunde',
stichtag
from
dtl_vr_auszahlungen a
where stichtag between (select to_date('01.01.'||to_char(stichtag,'YYYY'),'DD.MM.YYYY') from vr_parameter) and (select max (stichtag) from dtl_vr_auszahlungen where stichtag <= (select to_date('31.12.'||to_char(stichtag,'YYYY'),'DD.MM.YYYY') from vr_parameter))
and (nvl(a.buergschaften,0)+nvl(a.programmkredite,0)+nvl(a.disagio,0)+nvl(a.gebuehren_provisionen,0)+nvl(a.globaldarlehen,0)+
nvl(a.liquiditaetwirksame_auszahlung,0)) <> 0

order by kd_nr,stichtag asc
